label: literal
comment: Requires node to be an rdf:Literal

label: nonliteral
comment: Requires node to be a Blank Node or IRI

label: iri
comment: Requires node to be an IRI

label: bnode
comment: Requires node to be a Blank Node

label: annotation
comment: Annotations on a TripleExpression.

label: closed
comment: Indicates that a Shape is closed, meaning that it may contain no property values other than those used within TripleConstraints.

label: code
comment: Code executed by Semantic Action.

label: datatype
comment: A datatype constraint.

label: exclusion
comment: Values that are excluded from value matching.

label: expression
comment: Expression associated with the TripleExpression.

label: expressions
comment: List of 2 or more expressions associated with the TripleExpression.

label: extra
comment: Properties which may have extra values beyond those matched through a constraint.

label: flags
comment: Regular expression flags

label: fraction digits
comment: for "fractiondigits" constraints, v is less than or equals the number of digits to the right of the decimal place in the XML Schema canonical form[xmlschema-2] of the value of n, ignoring trailing zeros.

label: inverse
comment: Constrains the subject of a triple, rather than the object.

label: length
comment: The exact length of the value of the cell.

label: maximum cardinality
comment: Maximum number of times this TripleExpression may match; -1 for “*”

label: max exclusive
comment: An atomic property that contains a single number that is the maximum valid value (exclusive).

label: max inclusive
comment: An atomic property that contains a single number that is the maximum valid value (inclusive).

label: max length
comment: A numeric atomic property that contains a single integer that is the maximum length of the value.

label: minimum cardinatliy
comment: Minimum number of times this TripleExpression may match.

label: min exclusive
comment: An atomic property that contains a single number that is the minimum valid value (exclusive).

label: min inclusive
comment: An atomic property that contains a single number that is the minimum valid value (inclusive).

label: min length
comment: An atomic property that contains a single integer that is the minimum length of the value.

label: name
comment: Identifier of SemAct extension.

label: node kind
comment: Restiction on the kind of node matched; restricted to the defined instances of NodeKind. One of shex:iri, shex:bnode, shex:literal, or shex:nonliteral.
Abstract property of numeric facets on a NodeConstraint.

label: object
comment: The object of an Annotation.

label: pattern
comment: A regular expression used for matching a value.

label: predicate
comment: The predicate of a TripleConstraint or Annotation.

label: semantic action
comment: Semantic Actions on this TripleExpression.

label: shapes
comment: Shapes in this Schema.

label: shape expression
comment: Shape Expression referenced by this shape.

label: shape expressions
comment: A list of 2 or more Shape Expressions referenced by this shape.

label: start
comment: A ShapeExpression matched against the focus node prior to any other mapped expressions.

label: start actions
comment: Semantic Actions run on the Schema.

label: stem
comment: A stem value used for matching or excluding values.
An abstract property of string facets on a NodeConstraint.

label: total digits
comment: for "totaldigits" constraints, v equals the number of digits in the XML Schema canonical form[xmlschema-2] of the value of n

label: values
comment: A value restriction on a NodeConstraint.

label: value expression
comment: A ShapeExpression used for matching the object (or subject if inverted) of a TripleConstraint.
An abstract property of string and numeric facets on a NodeConstraint.

label: Annotation
comment: Annotations provide a format-independent way to provide additional information about elements in a schema.

label: Each Of
comment: A TripleExpression composed of one or more sub-expressions, all of which must match.

label: Node Constraint
comment: A constraint on the type or value of an RDF Node.

label: Node Kind
comment: The set of kinds of RDF Nodes.

label: One Of
comment: A TripleExpression composed of one or more sub-expressions, one of which must match.

label: Schema
comment: A Schema contains the set of shapes, used for matching a focus node.

label: Semantic Actions
comment: A list of Semantic Actions that serve as an extension point for Shape Expressions. They appear in lists in Schema's startActs and Shape, OneOf, EachOf and TripleConstraint's semActs.

label: Shape Or
comment: A shapes schema is captured in a Schema object where shapes is a mapping from shape label to shape expression.

label: Shape And
comment: A ShapeExpression composed of one or more sub-expressions, all of which must match.

label: Shape Expression
comment: The abstract class of Shape Expressions.

label: Shape External
comment: A reference to a shape defined in some external Schema.

label: Shape Not
comment: A ShapeNot is satisfied when it’s included ShapeExpression is not satisfied.

label: Shape Or
comment: A ShapeExpression composed of one or more sub-expressions, one of which must match.

label: Stem
comment: Abstract class for Stems

label: IRI Stem
comment: An IRI prefix used for matching IRIs.

label: Literal Stem
comment: An Literal prefix used for matching Literals.

label: Language Stem
comment: An Language prefix used for matching Literal Languages.

label: StemRange
comment: Abstract Class for Stem Ranges

label: IRI StemRange
comment: An IRI prefix (or wildcard) along with a set of excluded values, used for node matching.

label: Literal StemRange
comment: An Literal prefix (or wildcard) along with a set of excluded values, used for node matching.

label: Language StemRange
comment: An Language prefix (or wildcard) along with a set of excluded values, used for node matching.

label: Triple Constraint
comment: A constraint on a triple having a specific predicate and optionally a shape expression used for matching values.

label: Triple Expression
comment: The abstract class of Triple Expressions.

label: Wildcard
comment: Indicates that a stem is a Wildcard, rather than a URI prefix.
A synonym for the annotation property.
A synonym for the exclusion property.
A synonym for @id.
A synonym for @language.
A synonym for @type.
A synonym for @value.
